# my-component



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property    | Attribute    | Description                                            | Type                                   | Default     |
| ----------- | ------------ | ------------------------------------------------------ | -------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `ariaLabel` | `aria-label` | Accessible label for the button                        | `string`                               | `undefined` |
| `disabled`  | `disabled`   | If true, the button is disabled                        | `boolean`                              | `false`     |
| `size`      | `size`       | The size of the button                                 | `"large" \| "medium" \| "small"`       | `'medium'`  |
| `text`      | `text`       | The text to display on the button (if no slot is used) | `string`                               | `undefined` |
| `type`      | `type`       | The type of the button                                 | `"button" \| "reset" \| "submit"`      | `'button'`  |
| `variant`   | `variant`    | The variant of the button (for styling)                | `"danger" \| "primary" \| "secondary"` | `'primary'` |


## Events

| Event         | Description                        | Type                      |
| ------------- | ---------------------------------- | ------------------------- |
| `buttonClick` | Emitted when the button is clicked | `CustomEvent<MouseEvent>` |
